headline: PICK’s Copper Bet Faces Critical Test as China Infrastructure Spending Looms
summary: The iShares MSCI Global Metals & Mining Producers ETF (NYSEARCA:PICK) has surged 66% over the past year, climbing from roughly $35 to $58 per share. That rally reflects renewed optimism around industrial metals, particularly copper and iron ore, as infrastructure spending and energy transition projects drive demand.
